The Trustees have secured the participating employers' agreement to funding the total deficit of Â£603m. The Actuarial Valuation Committee has played the leading role in reviewing the Actuary's valuation and carrying out the negotiations on the technical provisions and recovery plan for each of the Fund's sections with the Principal Employer, acting on behalf of all the participating employers.
